field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv)

field.name: loai
field.check: loai not in (select ma_loai from hrdmloaitp)

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0
-- Checking &CheckLockedBeforeImport;&Checking; &EndErrorMode; -- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output
if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrAwardsPenalties', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay, loai, tien, ly_do into #r from hrcttp select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.ngay, a.loai, a.tien, a.ly_do' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
-- Delete if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrcttp b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay = b.ngay and a.loai = b.loai) select a.stt_rec, a.ngay, a.loai, a.tien, a.ly_do into #k from #r a join hrcttp b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay = b.ngay and a.loai = b.loai delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay = b.ngay and a.loai = b.loai)
-- Insert &Inserting;
-- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrcttp set @@list from hrcttp a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay = b.ngay and a.loai = b.loai end
